metadata.Title: CVE-2021-41687 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description: DCMTK through 3.6.6 does not handle memory free properly. The program malloc a heap memory for parsing data, but does not free it when error in parsing. Sending specific requests to the dcmqrdb program incur the memory leak. An attacker can use it to launch a DoS attack.

criterions.comment: dcmtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
